title: Roti Mediterranean Grill
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Mediterranean, Catering, Middle Eastern, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Chain restaurant with multiple locations. Offers falafel and vegetables in sandwiches and bowls made to order and other vegan choices. Has gluten-free pita bread. Vegan information available on website. Locations in Chicago, Washington DC, New York, Maryland and Virginia.
